response.answer_text: There are actually a lot of free classes available on Skillshare. However, many are premium, which means you must be a premium member to access them. Currently, it is $12/mo (or you can save 33% by paying annually - $96/yr, which works out to $8/mo). Having said that, a lot of teachers offer a certain amount of free enrollment links to their premium courses. Some do 25, some do 100, others do time-limited offers; it just depends on what their goals are. There are numerous Facebook groups where Skillshare teachers offer those links, and they can be found by doing a search for Skillshare and going through the groups. If you would like to check out ALL of the courses (which is going on 10,000 now!), you can sign up for 3 months of premium for 99 cents.

Skillshare has a special section of free classes available on its site. This section includes free classes on various subjects: Technology, Business, Creative, Lifestyle. These classes are free for everyone. You don’t need a premium membership to access these free classes. Skillshare also provides FREE membership of premium accounts for the 2 months since signup. With this premium membership, you can access any premium class on Skillshare for free for 2 months.  The curated list of Free Skillshare Classes on Programming is also very useful for the programmers and developers to learn new skills related to coding from these thousands of free classes on Skillshare.

There are a lot of classes on SkillShare which is free, but, not all classes are free. Now, to access classes for free, you must join SkillShare now and enjoy 2 FREE MONTHS on unlimited access on 25000+ SkillShare courses or classes. You can learn a lot in those two months.
